Package com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.sprites.tiled

Class StaticSprite

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.sprites.GameObject
com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.sprites.tiled.TiledObject
com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.sprites.tiled.StaticSprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
House, ParcelVan, TileIndicator
public class StaticSprite
extends TiledObject
Class representing a sprite shown on screen, ready to be drawn with batch.draw(); in MainScreen class. Sprite cannot move from the tile it's first placed on. MainScreen interfaces with this class through GameObject.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaticSprite

      public StaticSprite​(java.lang.String png, int x, int y, int height, int width)
      Create a new static sprite
      Parameters:
      png - the .png file of the sprite's texture
      x - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
      y - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
      height - the height of the sprite (in Tiles)
      width - the width of the sprite (in Tiles)
